Secondary objective obtain data feasibility protocol ( pilot study ) . To obtain data useful perform sample size calculation big study design specifically investigate beneficial effect inulin‐type fructans treatment constipate child . Study design subject : Double‐blind , randomize , placebo‐controlled parallel group trial ; 2‐5 year‐old constipate child receive inulin‐type fructans amount placebo ( maltodextrin ) 6 week . The study protocol approve local Ethical Committees . Outcomes : primary outcome stool consistency . Secondary outcome : stool frequency , gastrointestinal symptom ( abdominal pain pain defecation ) , additional medication require ( yes/no ) , colonic transit time . Stool sample baseline , end intervention follow‐up obtain order analyse know microbiota . Dietary intake also record baseline , end intervention follow-up . Principal subject inclusion criterion : Subjects recruit fulfil Rome III constipation criterion ( Mainly hard stools plus stool retention , pain , low frequency ) . Principal subject exclusion criterion : Age 2 5 year , diaper use , use laxative study 2 week , use pre‐ probiotic antibiotic study 4 week , organic cause defecation disorder , metabolic renal abnormality mental retardation , parent 's command local language .
